text: Punjab Control of Organised Crime Act, (PCOCA) is law to be enacted by Punjab state in India to combat organised crime. It is in process of approval as the Punjab Cabinet has yet not given its approval on account of few reservations about various clauses of the Act.The Act is designed on the pattern of Maharashtra Control of Organised Crime Act enacted in 1999. ==References== Category:State legislation in India Category:Crime in Punjab, India Category:Government of Punjab, India Category:Proposed laws of India Category:Organised crime in India Category:Acts related to organized crime
title: Punjab Control of Organised Crime Act
